text: Sultanın olarak sana kılıcını bırakmanı emrediyorum.
english: As your Sultan, I command you to lay down your sword. Brat
Don't forget that you're at my service, Noyan. Is

text: Belli ki Noyan, isyancı Türkmen obalarıyla bir olmuş.
english: It's clear that Noyan has sided with the rebellious Turkmen tribes.

text: ...bu zavallı çocuğu da kandırması zor olmasa gerek.
english: ...it shouldn't be difficult to deceive this poor child.
Perhaps that is why our Sultan... issued a decree ordering the execution of
Prince Yiğit wherever he is found
Gökçe Hatun will bring Tuğtekin to you. Weren't you swearing oaths to

text: Ertuğrul'un soyunu kurutacağım diye yeminler etmiyor muydun?

english: (Saadettin) Here's your chance. You will kill
Tugtekin, who is of Ertugrul's blood .
You have to kill him so that...

text: ...ben de devlete sadık Sungur Tekin'i hak ettiği mevkie getireyim.
english: ...I can bring Sungur Tekin, who is loyal to the state, to the position he deserves.

text: Obamızı, sultanlığını ilan eden ahmak bir çocuk için tehlikeye atamayız.
english: We cannot jeopardize our community for the sake of a foolish child who has declared himself sultan.

text: Biz oraya sadece Yiğit'i kurtarmaya değil, Köpek'in oyununu bozmaya da gideriz.
english: We're going there not only to rescue Yiğit, but also to foil Köpek's plan. You keep

text: Hâlâ aynı şeyleri söyleyip durursun Ertuğrul.
english: saying the same things over and over, Ertuğrul. You told us how
Yiğit and his father were mere pawns

text: ...Eyyubilerin de elinde nasıl oyuncak olduğunu sen bize anlattın.
english: in the hands of both the Templars and the Ayyubids . You've

text: Bunca şeyi görüp yaşadın. Hâlâ o çocuğu kurtarmak mı istersin?
english: seen and experienced so much. Do you still want to save that child? This kid
has declared himself king . He wanted both

text: Anamın da, Tuğtekin'in de kendisine itaat etmesini istedi.
english: my mother and Tugtekin to obey him. Can't you see they're
using him, brother? What difference will

text: Sultan Alaeddin çoktan ordusunu alıp yola çıktı.
english: Sultan Alaeddin had already gathered his army and set out. He's

text: Şimdilik üç oba isyana tevessül etti.
english: So far, three tribes have attempted to revolt .

text: Ardından belki diğer obalar isyana katılacak.
english: Then perhaps other tribes will join the rebellion.

text: Yiğit'in yaşadığı her dakika, her gün devlete tehdit demektir.
english: Every minute, every day that Yiğit lives, represents a threat to the state.

text: Sakın ola ki Halime Sultan'ın kardeşi diye...
english: Please, my brother, don't lead us down paths with uncertain outcomes just because he's Halime Sultan's brother.

text: ...bizi sonu belli olmayan yollara sürüklemeyesin kardeşim.
Yiğit sadece devlet için değil, bizim için de bir tehdittir.
english: Yiğit is a threat not only to the state, but also to us.

text: Hayırlısıyla şu baskını yapıp, inini başına geçirin Noyan'ın.
english: Hopefully, you'll carry out this raid and destroy Noyan's lair.

text: (Hayme) Şehzade Yiğit'e gelince. Madem Köpek'e güvenmezsin...
english: As for Prince Yiğit (Hayme)... Since you don't trust the Dog...

text: ...o vakit yıllardır uğruna savaştığımız sultanımıza teslim edersin.
english: ...then you should hand him over to our Sultan, for whom we have been fighting for years. From now on,
...and justice of our Sultan. We're going on

text: Sabah Alplerle beraber bir yere baskına gideceğiz.
english: a raid with the Alps tomorrow morning .

text: Lakin beyler nereye gideceğimizi sır gibi saklarlar.
english: But gentlemen, they keep our destination a secret.

text: Ben nereye gideceğinizi bilirim, lakin sen onlarla baskına gitmeyeceksin.
english: I know where you're going, but you won't be going on a raid with them.
What do you command me to do, Your Highness?

text: Allah'ın izniyle bu işi alnımızın akıyla bitirdiğimizde Konya'ya gideceğim.
english: God willing, when we finish this job successfully, I will go to Konya. I would like

text: Senin de benimle gelmeni ve mahiyetime girmeni isterim.
english: you to come with me and become part of my inner circle.

text: Siz nasıl münasip görürseniz Emir Hazretleri.
english: As you see fit, Your Highness.

text: O halde Gökçe Hatun'u Noyan'a vereceksin.
english: Then you will give Gökçe Hatun to Noyan.
You will set off before sunrise, my sultan.

text: Sadık beyleriniz sizi kutlu ordunuza götürecekler.
english: Your loyal lords will lead you to your glorious army.

text: Askerlerim de size eşlik edecekler sultanım.
english: My soldiers will also accompany you, my sultan.

text: Uğrunuzda ölmeye hazır nice yiğitler, sizi görmek için sabırsızlanırlar sultanım.
english: Many valiant warriors, ready to die for you, eagerly await your arrival, my Sultan.
... you yourself will take his head, my Sultan. You will not let
your late father's blood be spilled in vain .

text: Kefersud'dan Kaya Bey, Harput'tan Kutlu Bey...
english: Kaya Bey from Kefersud and Kutlu Bey from Harput...

text: ...ordunuza katılmak için Alpleriyle yola çıkmıştır sultanım.
english: ...have set out with their Alps to join your army, my Sultan.
Your presence has added strength to our power, my sultan. May
God never take you away from us.

text: At tökezliyor beyim. Belli ki canı yanar. Gidemiyor.
english: horse is stumbling, sir. It's clear that he's hurting. He can't go.

text: Boğaç, sen obaya geri dön. Cenkte bize yük olma.
english: Bogac, you go back to the camp. Don't be a burden to us in battle. Yes sir

text: Turgut kardeş bizi burada bekleyeceğini söylediydi.
english: Turgut said he would wait for us here. Sir
Or is it... what comes to your mind?

text: Nedir kardeş aklına gelen? Anlat hepsini.
english: What's on your mind, brother? Tell me everything.
Do you have permission, Gökçe Hatun?

text: Ertuğrul Bey ile Tuğtekin Bey birbirlerine girdiler. Zor ayırdık.
english: Ertuğrul Bey and Tuğtekin Bey got into a fight. We had a hard time separating them.
What do you say, Boğaç Alp?
We didn't understand either, Gökçe Hatun.
He went to Duru Hatun's grave.
(Noyan) Don't waste your breath, hot woman. The

text: Ateşli oğlan mağaraya beni öldürmeye gitti.
english: hot-tempered boy went into the cave to kill me.
They've hidden them behind the trees, sir.
Mom, this place isn't safe. We need to

text: Bir an evvel obaya dönmemiz icap eder.
english: return to the camp as soon as possible .

text: Dündar, çabuk obaya git. Alpleri topla gel.
english: Dündar, go to the camp quickly. Gather the Alps and bring them here.
you think this is Noyan's doing?

text: Bu deliliği başka kim yapacak ana?
english: Who else would do something so crazy, mother?
Oh dear, oh dear. Everyone who
you were loitering in your den…
Tugtekin, my brother. I'll make him regret

text: Gökçe onun elindeyken nasıl sakin olurum Ertuğrul?
english: How can I stay calm, Ertuğrul, when Gökçe is in his hands?
In my cave with my sons and my guards.

text: Madem siz de ayağıma kadar geldiniz…
english: Since you've come all the way to me... well,
I'll spend some time with you.
Your power only extends to women. Your carcass
will come out of here. You
The women of Kayı are braver than their men.

text: (Noyan) Ertuğrul hariç, görmek istediğim herkes burada.
english: Except for (Noyan) Ertuğrul, everyone I wanted to see is here.
What more could I ask from the holy spirits? It is forbidden for us to

text: Senin öldüğünü görmeden ölmek, bize haramdır Noyan.
english: die before seeing you die, Noyan.
… is worth more than futile bravery, crippled boy. That

text: Çolak kolun seni canından edecek, haberin yok.
english: crippled arm is going to cost you your life, you don't even know it.
Come here, you son of a bitch, come here.

text: Belli ki kolun sana hayatı zindan etmiş çolak oğlan.
english: Clearly, your crippled arm has made your life hell, you lame boy.
My heart cannot accept this. Let
me relieve you of this suffering.

text: Dündar, biz iyiyiz oğul. Bizi bırak.
english: Dündar, we're fine, son. Leave us alone.

text: Şu Noyan itinin peşinden gidin çabuk.
english: Go after that Noyan bastard quickly. Come on
They've gone this way, sir. Come on
-(Tugtekin) I'll tear your heart out. -(Ertuğrul) Tuğtekin Bey.

text: Tuğtekin Bey, merak etmeyesin. Er ya da geç onu yakalayacağız.
english: Mr. Tuğtekin, don't worry. We'll catch him sooner or later.
I'll tear your heart out. Don't worry
rip his heart out and give it to him. Goo

text: Tuğtekin obaya varana dek onu yalnız bırakmayasın Ertuğrul.
english: Ertuğrul, don't leave Tuğtekin alone until he reaches the camp. Are
n't you coming with us, big brother?
No. I won't return to the camp until

text: Noyan ile Yiğit’i bulmadan obaya dönmeyeceğim.

english: This job needs to be finished quickly. -May God
…you must bring him back to the camp safe and sound, brother. Let's

text: Sultan Alaeddin’e teslim edelim. Cezasını o versin.
english: hand them over to Sultan Alaeddin. Let him administer the punishment. May

text: (Sungur iç ses) Ertuğrul, Yiğit’e gelince adaletin susmasın.
english: (Sungur's inner voice) When it comes to Ertuğrul and Yiğit, let justice not be silent.
(Sungur's inner voice) If he rebels, he will die.

text: Yarın sizin zafer gününüz olacak Emir Hazretleri.
english: Tomorrow will be your day of victory, Your Highness.
Along with the rebellious Turkmen chieftains…
…will receive their share of my wrath . God willing,

text: Yarınki cenge inşallah bizatihi ben komuta edeceğim.
english: I will personally command tomorrow's battle.

text: Yarın bana biat etmeyenlerin yok olacağı kutlu bir gün olacak.
english: Tomorrow will be a blessed day when those who do not pledge allegiance to me will perish.
The order of this state is above everyone.

text: Sungur Tekin ve Gündoğdu’nun akıbeti ne olacak Emir Hazretleri?
english: Sungur Tekin and Gündoğdu, Your Highness ?

text: Onlar obalarının istikbali için her şeyi yapar.
english: They will do anything for the future of their tribe . I
have thoughts about the Kayı tribe. It's time for

text: Onların içinden yeni bir kahraman çıkma vakti geldi.
english: a new hero to emerge from among them . The

text: Bu kahramanın yuları da benim avuçlarımda olacak.
english: reins of this hero will also be in my hands.
How will this happen, Your Highness? What I'm really
curious about is, who will it be?

text: Sungur Tekin benim sayemde Noyan’ı öldürüp…
english: Sungur Tekin will become a hero when he kills Noyan and
kidnaps Gökçe Hatun, all thanks to me .
Then you'll see the uproar. We'll wait and
You shouldered all the burdens of the state.

text: Düşmana karşı ilk siz cenk ettiniz.
english: You were the first to fight the enemy.

text: Devletiniz için can verdiniz. Evlat acısı çektiniz.
english: You gave your life for your country. You have experienced the pain of losing a child. There were times when
You've been left without pastures, without grazing lands. Where was Sultan Alaeddin while

text: Siz bu cefaları çekerken Sultan Alaeddin neredeydi?
Şimdi size soruyorum. Bir sultan, tebaasını görmezden gelir mi?
english: Now I ask you. Would a sultan ignore his subjects?

text: Bir sultan, milleti cefa çekerken sefa sürer mi?
english: a sultan live in luxury while his people suffer ?

text: Şimdi hakkınız olanı alma vakti değil midir?
english: now the time to claim what you deserve ?
(All together) Yes! Isn't it time you

text: Size yaraşır bir sultana tabi olma vakti gelmedi mi?
english: submitted to a sultan worthy of you ?
The time has come to claim what is rightfully yours. That's
why I came here. I have come to show you the

text: Devletin adalet ve şefkatini size göstermeye geldim.
english: justice and compassion of the state .

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Canımız sana feda olsun!
english: (All together) We would give our lives for you!

text: Benim kaderim ne olacak Emir Hazretleri?
english: What will become of me, Your Highness? Don't worry, my dear
After you've taken your revenge... you'll
also see the reward for your actions . You more than deserved

text: Soylu ve ihtişamlı bir ömrü ziyadesiyle hak ettin.

english: I will take you to the palace to be with me.
I'm going to marry her to one of my most valued commanders.

text: Böylece bana ve devletine hizmete devam edebilirsin.
english: In this way you can continue to serve me and your country . When we

text: Halamın ve babamın intikamını aldığımız vakit…
english: avenge my aunt and my father…

text: …bu cihan benim için cennet olacaktır Emir Hazretleri.
english: …this world will be paradise for me, Your Highness.
I will never forget the kindness you showed me throughout my life. Do
n't let Noyan know you came here. Don't forget

text: …sen de Gökçe’yi orada bırakıp hemen ayrılacaksın.
english: …you will leave Gökçe there and depart immediately.

text: (Gökçe dış ses) Müsaaden olursa elini öpüp helallik almak isterim.
english: (Gökçe's voiceover) If you allow me, I would like to kiss your hand and ask for your forgiveness.

text: Bu mutlu günümde erimin çadırına girerken…
english: I enter my husband's tent on this happy day...
I wish to enter with your blessings, sister.

text: (Selcan dış ses) Dualarım her daim seninle ve erinle olacaktır.
english: (Selcan's voiceover) My prayers will always be with you and your husband.

text: (Selcan dış ses) Sen benim canımdan bir parçasın.
english: (Selcan's voiceover) You are a part of my soul.

text: (Selcan dış ses) Sen nasıl hayat boyu erinin yanında olacaksan…
english: (Selcan's voiceover) Just as you will be by your husband's side for life...

text: …bacın da her daim senin yanında olacak.
english: ...your sister will always be by your side.

text: Tuğtekin Bey’le arasına giren bulutlar bir bir dağılmaktaydı.
english: The clouds that had come between her and Mr. Tuğtekin were dispersing one by one.
The sun was rising over their tents.

text: Belki de ömründe ilk kez bu kadar mutluydu Gökçe’m.
english: Perhaps Gökçe had never been so happy in her life.
That scoundrel came and took my brother.
Noyan knew we were going to raid his lair . He

text: Beylerin baskın için otağdan çıkmasını bekledi.
english: He waited for the lords to leave the tent to launch the raid.
Then he kidnapped my daughter Gökçe. They

text: O vakit Ertuğrul’a da tuzak kurmuşlardır.
english: also set a trap for Ertuğrul at that time . We ourselves sent

text: Kendi ellerimizle yiğitlerimizi Noyan’ın tuzağına yolladık.
english: our brave men into Noyan's trap.

text: O zaman derhal yiğitlerimizin peşine düşmemiz lazım ağabey.
english: Then we need to go after our brave men immediately, brother. Oh
God, protect our brave soldiers! May God grant them a

text: Sağ salim obaya dönmelerini nasip et.

english: What happens now, big brother? Are we just
going to sit here with our hands tied? Just try to stay

text: Sen hele biraz sükûnetini koru kardeşim.
Ertuğrul muhakkak bir hâl çaresine bakacaktır.
english: Ertuğrul will certainly find a solution.

text: Asıl mesele, Noyan neden Gökçe Hatun’u kaçırmak istedi?
english: The real question is, why did Noyan want to kidnap Gökçe Hatun?
I'll kill you. So you lured the

text: Dodurga’nın hatununu tuzağımıza düşürdün demek Noyan?
english: woman from Dodurga into our trap, Noyan?

text: Demek şimdi de Noyan’ın hatunu oldun, ha?
english: So now you're Noyan's wife, huh?

text: Unutmayasın ki Tuğtekin’i bize o getirecek.
english: Don't forget that he's the one who will bring Tuğtekin to us.

text: Ertuğrul’un kardeşi Dündar, oku yaman attı.
english: Ertuğrul's brother Dündar shot his arrow with great skill.
What's the situation, Doğan Alp? Were
you able to find Mr. Yiğit?
We couldn't find (Doğan) Yiğit, Banı Çiçek Hatun.
What about Turgut Alp? Where is he/she?
My brother Turgut is also in Noyan's hands.
Where is Gökçe Hatun, Hayme Ana?
Tell them, say that Gökçe Hatun is in the camp.

text: Koca obada bir yiğit çıkıp da dur diyemedi mi?
english: whole village, couldn't a single brave man step forward and say "stop"? Was the

text: Bey hatunu kaçırılırken can verip engel olamadı mı?
english: bey unable to prevent his wife from being kidnapped, even though he lost his life ?
But forgive us, we couldn't stop it. Were

text: Gökçe’nin mezarlıkta ne işi vardı ağabey?
english: Gökçe doing at the cemetery, brother?

text: Belli ki biri onu bile bile oraya göndermiş.
english: Clearly, someone sent him there on purpose.
I will find that traitor. I'll tear

text: Obanın ortasında etlerini lime lime edeceğim.
english: their flesh to shreds in the middle of the village .
I'll feed his bones to hungry wolves.

text: Şunu bilesin ki onun derdi seninledir…
english: Know this: his problem is with you…
…not with Gökçe Hatun. He won't kill him. Mr. Tugtekin

text: Seni tuzağa çekmek ister Tuğtekin Bey.
english: wants to lure you into a trap .

text: Bu soysuz kadını bana getirdin ya, acılarımı dindirdin Noyan.
english: You brought this vile woman to me, and now you've eased my pain, Noyan.
...and make the valiant horses within him neigh .

text: Sen de onlar gibi gebereceksin Gökçe Hatun, bilirsin değil mi?
english: You too will die like them, Gökçe Hatun, you know that, don't you?
I know your anger, Goncagül Hatun.

text: Lakin istediğimiz Gökçe değildir. O sadece yemdir.
english: But the Gökçe we want is not that one. It's just bait. It was Ertuğrul and Tuğtekin who

text: Sevdiklerini senden alan Ertuğrul ile Tuğtekin’dir.
english: took your loved ones from you .

text: Sakın öfkene yenilip her şeyi berbat etmeyesin.
english: Don't let your anger get the better of you and ruin everything.
, I'll keep my anger to myself.

text: Yarın Ertuğrul da, Tuğtekin de ölecek.
english: Tomorrow, both Ertuğrul and Tuğtekin will die.
Tomorrow will be our special day. That

text: İşte o vakit intikamımı almış olacağız Noyan.
english: 's when we'll have our revenge, Noyan.

text: Bu gece gözünü Gökçe Hatun’dan ayırmayasın.
english: Tonight, do not take your eyes off Gökçe Hatun. We need to deliver

text: Onu sağ salim Sungur Tekin’e teslim etmemiz gerekmektedir.
english: him safely to Sungur Tekin . Do
who sent Gökçe Hatun to the cemetery is the same person who
placed her dress in the cave . He is
They mustn't realize that we know there are traitors in our tribe.
I will find that traitor. If he managed to persuade

text: Gökçe Hatun’u mezarlığa kadar gitmeye ikna ettiyse…
english: Gökçe Hatun to go to the cemetery …
What does Emir Saadettin want from me?
Emir Saadettin, in order to kill Noyan,
stole the Oğuz Kağan seal and gave it to Tangut.

text: Şimdi nasıl oldu da ikisi iş birliği yaptı?
english: How did the two of them end up cooperating? I ca

text: Düşmanlarımız bize karşı ittifak etmişlerdir ağabey.
english: Our enemies have formed an alliance against us, brother.

text: Saadettin Köpek bizi birbirimize kırdırmak ister.
english: Saadettin Köpek wants to turn us against each other. The lord wants to ruin

text: Bey hatununu kaçırarak senin itibarını silmek ister.
english: your reputation by kidnapping your wife . By having
Noyan do all the dirty work, he...
What kind of game is this, son?

text: Bu ite daha ne kadar can vereceğiz?
english: How many more lives will we give to this dog?

text: Bu öyle bir oyundur ki ana...
english: This is a game, mother, that...
...one end goes all the way to Gökçe Hatun...
...and the other end goes all the way to Sultan Alaeddin. We didn't allow him
...now he wants to do it himself.
...he wants to get rid of Tugtekin Bey and me.
To bring the Turkmen tribes to their knees.

text: Mademki o bize dünyayı dar eder, zulüm eder...
english: Since he makes our lives miserable, inflicts cruelty upon us...
...for the lives he takes, the homes he destroys...
...I bequeath to you that you must never let go of him .
... may you avenge them. Rather than

text: (Tuğtekin dış ses) Hayrola Boğaç? Neyi var hayvanın?
english: (Tugtekin's voiceover) What's wrong, Bogac? What's wrong with the animal? The
It's clear that he's hurting. He can't go.
Bogac, you go back to the camp.
(Tugtekin) Don't be a burden to us in battle. Yes sir
I know who the traitor is.
Where is Boğaç? My lord, he went with the Alps that

text: Hayme Ana'nın Gökçe Hatun'u aramaya gönderdiği Alplerle gitti beyim.
english: Hayme Ana sent to search for Gökçe Hatun .
What is this despair all about, brother? The
time for resurrection has arrived. It is dawn
My Turgut never saw the light of day, brother.
Our brother has been taken prisoner again.

text: Turgut'u bulmak için atlarımızın nal sesleri...
english: To find Turgut, the sound of our horses' hooves...
... will merge with the sparks of our swords.

text: Umudumuzu da, duamızı da eksik etmeyeceğiz kardeş.
english: We will not lose hope or our prayers, brother.
Because where our weapons cannot reach,
our prayers will reach, brother. You're
We have emerged from many battles. We've

text: Yılmadık, yıkılmadık. Şimdi mi yıkılacağız be?
english: We did not give up, we did not collapse. Are we going to collapse now?
Of course he's alive, brother, he's alive. Have

text: Turgut Tapınakçıların elinden nasıl kurtuldu, unuttun mu?
english: you forgotten how Turgut escaped from the Templars? Do you really think

text: Hem kardeş, beyimiz Turgut kardeşimizi Moğol itinin elinde bırakır mı sanırsın?
english: our brother Turgut would leave our brother in the hands of that Mongol dog?
Will you give up, brother? Do you

text: Ben kardeş, ben bırakır mıyım sanırsın?
english: think I, brother, would abandon you?
We will both rescue our brother Turgut

text: ...hem de o Moğol itlerine bu toprakları mezar eyleyeceğiz.
english: ... and turn these lands into a graveyard for those Mongol dogs . With
God on our side, there's nothing to worry about, brother. With
God on my side, there's nothing to worry about. It

text: Mağaraya baskına giderken atının tökezlediğini söylemişti.
english: horse had stumbled while they were raiding the cave . The

text: Bu altınların da nereden geldiği belli.
english: It's clear where this gold came from.
Where is this scoundrel? He went

text: Alplerle birlikte Gökçe Hatun'u aramaya gitmiş.
english: with Alp to search for Gökçe Hatun.
Your anger is immense, Mr. Tugtekin.

text: Lakin seni Gökçe Hatun'a götürecek olan da Boğaç'tır.
english: But it is Boğaç who will take you to Gökçe Hatun .
That dog will take me to Noyan. I
'll send them both to hell too.
We can't reach Noyan unless he wants us to.
We should wait for a sign from him.
Noyan has abducted Gökçe Hatun from the
tribe, as you ordered, Your Highness.
Your place in my heart is steadily rising. I am always ready to give

english: my life for our state, Your Highness.

text: Sungur Tekin Bey geldi, Emir Hazretleri.
english: Mr. Sungur Tekin has arrived, Your Highness.
You go out from the back.
Go to Noyan when the sun rises...
I saw that he looked upset.
We completely destroyed his lair, but...

english: But you couldn't find either him or Prince Yiğit, could you?
He knew we were going to raid his lair.
Taking advantage of our absence from the camp, he

text: ...Tuğtekin Bey'i tuzağa düşürmek için Gökçe Hatun'u kaçırmak istemiş.

news from Alp, whom I sent to the camp.
I'm sorry to hear that, Sungur Tekin. I know you and

english: Gökçe Hatun grew up together in the same tent, like sisters. He is fulfilling, one by one, the
oath he swore to wipe out our lineage

text: Ona hizmet eden biri var obada mutlaka.

...to keep the promise I made to you. I know you care about the future of your

text: Devletin istikbali kadar kendi obanın da istikbalini düşünürsün, bunu bilirim.

text: Yanında obanızdan bir kadın olduğunu öğrendim.

text: Bütün oyunlarını da onunla birlikte yapar.

english: I also found out where Noyan's lair is.
...he must have taken her to a secret place.

text: Ve Şehzade Yiğit de orada olmalı.

text: Sultan Alaeddin'in sana verdiği vazifeyi yerine getir.

Just eat a couple of bites. Get a good rest

text: Yarın ikimiz için de cenk günüdür.
english: Tomorrow is a day of battle for both of us. While
you settle the score with Noyan...

text: ...ben de isyancı Türkmen beylerinin karargâhını basacağım.

Yes. I also found out where they are. Before the
rebellious lords gather their marauding Alps to fight against Sultan Alaeddin... I

text: Gayrı bu topraklara huzurun gelmesinin vakti geldi.
english: now time for peace to come to these lands .

text: Eh, benim de buradaki işim bitmiştir.
english: Well, my work here is done as well.
I would consider returning to Konya.

text: Dönerken de yerime güvendiğim birini bırakmak isterim.

Death is very close to you. If
you imagine you can escape from me just as you escaped from the Templars...
Death is a reunion for me.

text: Senin hatun da en son yiğitlik göstermeye çalıştığında diri diri yandıydı.

...be sure Ertuğrul will come here. It

God not spoil our enjoyment in this world.

text: Bir bela biter, başka bir bela başlar şeyhim.

...with fighting the enemy that he can't even lift his head.

text: Başını kaldırır ki bak misafirimiz olur.

troubles and misfortunes never end. We
've become surprised when a day passes without trouble.

Grapes are one thing, grape molasses is another.

text: Pekmez olmak için üzüm olmak gerekir.
english: To become molasses, you need to be grapes.
Molasses isn't made from grapes either.

...but grape molasses is a remedy for a thousand ailments.

text: Üzüm uzun ve çileli yolculukların nihayetinde pekmez olur.

text: Bin derde deva olabilmek için bu yolculuğa çıkmak gerekir.

text: Evlat, Halep'e yola koyulduğun ilk günden itibaren...

n't be here when he arrives.

text: O zalimin elinde benim koklamaya kıyamadığım hatunum var Ertuğrul.

one to turn to for refuge except God... and no one to

rescue her and stop the rebellion.

has become as gloomy as the Gobi Desert.

n't let the rain make you feel cold. May

english: My lord! My lord was seen leaving the Boğaç village.
Jump on the horses. We're setting off.
My lord, we placed the Alps in the places you mentioned .

text: Şimdi ne edeceğiz beyim? Etrafta hiç at yok. Belli ki kimse de yoktur.
english: What are we going to do now, sir? There aren't any horses around. Clearly, there's nobody here.

text: Er ya da geç Noyan buraya gelecek.
english: Noyan will come here sooner or later.
Everyone should be on high alert.

text: Tek başına olsa bile çok canımıza kıymadan gebermeyecektir.
english: Even if he's alone, he won't die without causing us a lot of harm . Do

text: (Erkek) Ulu Bilge! Ulu Bilge, esir kaçıyor!
english: (Male) Great Sage! The Great Sage is escaping from captivity!
(Great Sage) Turgut is escaping! Catch him!

text: Bundan sonra gözlerin kapalı devam edeceksin.
english: will continue with your eyes closed from now on.

text: Süleyman Şah oğlu Ertuğrul pusatını vermez. Düş önüme.
english: Ertuğrul, son of Süleyman Şah, does not give up his weapon. Fall in front of me.
suit your hand at all. Give it to me and I'll

text: Hele ver de baltamın nasıl yakıştığını göstereyim sana.
english: show you how well it suits you.
-(Dogan) Oh my God! -(Bamsi) God is the Truth!

text: Allah'a çok şükür canına ilişmediler kardeş.
english: Thank God they didn't hurt you, brother. If it
weren't for Yiğit, I would have been dead long ago, my lord.

text: Halime Sultan'a yakışır bir kardeş olduğunu ispatladı.
english: He proved himself to be a worthy brother to Halime Sultan.
lost my mind, brother. I thought you were dead.

text: Ya Doğan kardeş, buna bir şey olur mu? Kaç kez öldürmeye çalıştılar da beceremediler.
english: Hey Doğan brother, will anything happen to this? They tried to kill him many times, but they couldn't. By

text: Ya kardeş, nasıl yardın şamanın kafayı karpuz gibi?
english: Hey brother, how did you split the shaman's head open like a watermelon?
(Noyan) The day I learned of your betrayal...
...I dedicated your corpse to the noble spirits, Sungur Tekin.
(Noyan) I will give both your corpses to the spirits.

text: Oğuz Kağan'ın mührü de ödülüm olacak.
english: Oğuz Kağan's seal will also be my prize.
(Sound of an arrow being fired) I will return

text: Soyunuzu kurutmak için döneceğim Sungur Tekin!
english: to wipe out your lineage, Sungur Tekin!

text: Ertuğrul'a söyle, beni beklesin. Obanıza yıldırım gibi düşeceğim.
english: Tell Ertuğrul to wait for me. I will descend upon your camp like lightning.

text: (Sungur Tekin iç ses) Bu kez seni öldüreceğim Noyan.
english: (Sungur Tekin's inner voice) This time I'm going to kill you, Noyan.

text: (Sungur Tekin iç ses) Ant olsun öldüreceğim.
english: (Sungur Tekin's inner voice) I swear I'll kill him.

text: (Gökçe) Tuğtekin, yalvarırım git buradan! Git buradan. Öldürecek seni.
english: (Gökçe) Tuğtekin, please leave here! Go away. He'll kill you.

text: Tuğtekin, yalvarırım git buradan! Yalvarırım. Öldürecek seni.
english: Tugtekin, please, just leave! Please. He'll kill you. We had some

text: Geçen seferden yarım kalan bir hesabımız vardı.

english: Now is the time to close that account.

text: Mademki geberdin diye attığım çukurdan çıktın...
english: Since you crawled out of the hole I threw you into thinking you were dead
You got what you wanted. Look, I'm right here.

text: Onun çilekeş ruhunu sonsuza kadar azat edeceğim.
english: I will set his suffering soul free forever. He

text: O benden Goncagül'ü aldı. Ben de senden onu alacağım.
english: took Goncagül from me. I'll take it from you too. An eye for an eye,

text: Kısasa kısas ateşli oğlan. Kısasa kısas.
english: fiery boy. An eye for an eye .
If the woman had behaved herself, she would have lived.
Perhaps he would be devastated by your pain.
My issue is with Ertuğrul. With

text: Seni de öldürecek. Yalvarırım git Tuğtekin. Git ne olur git.
english: kill you too. Please go, Tugtekin. Please go, just go .

text: Senin çilekeş ruhunu sonsuza kadar azat ediyorum.

english: I belong to you, Tugtekin. I

text: İplerini hançerle kesmiş. Kim verdi buna bu hançeri?
english: He cut the ropes with a dagger. Who gave him this dagger?

text: Sultanım, bu işten sizin bir haberiniz var mı?
english: Your Majesty, are you aware of this matter ?
(Sound of a horse neighing) I have come here so that

text: ...ne de Sultan Alaeddin'in hain bir oyuna alet olmaması için geldim buraya.
english: ...nor Sultan Alaeddin will be used as pawns in a treacherous plot.

text: Bilesiniz ki isyanınızın ardında Emir Saadettin vardır.
english: Know that Emir Saadettin is behind your rebellion.

text: (Ertuğrul) Başından beri attığınız her adımdan haberdardı.
english: (Ertuğrul) He was aware of every step you took from the beginning. It was Emir Saadettin who, along with

text: Noyan'la bir olup sizi bu hain tuzağa çeken Emir Saadettin'dir.
english: Noyan, lured you into this treacherous trap.

text: Ona biat etmeyeceğinizi bildiği için böyle bir oyuna başvurdu.
english: He resorted to this tactic because he knew you wouldn't pledge allegiance to him. As long as

text: Sultanımız yanımızda oldukça biz bu yoldan dönmeyiz Ertuğrul.
english: our Sultan is with us, we will not turn back from this path, Ertuğrul. We have invited

text: Seni yiğit bildiğimiz için, bileği bükülmez bildiğimiz için...
english: you here because we know you to be a brave and invincible man...

text: ...Alplerimizin başına komutan olasın diye misafir ettik.
english: ...so that you may become the commander of our Alps .
Know your place as a guest. Don't
you still understand, Mr. Konur? I'm telling you,

text: Emir Saadettin kendine biat etmeyen herkesi öldürecek derim size.
english: Emir Saadettin will kill anyone who doesn't pledge allegiance to him.

text: Belki de şu an askerleriyle birlikte üzerimize doğru gelmektedir.
english: Perhaps he is currently advancing towards us with his soldiers. The more you persist in your

text: İnat ettikçe kendinize de, obalarınıza da, Alplerinize de yazık edersiniz.
english: stubbornness, the more harm you will do to yourselves, your tribes, and your Alps. The

text: ...Moğollarla Haçlılar arasına sıkışıp kalmış tek bir devletimiz vardır.
english: ...we have only one state, caught between the Mongols and the Crusaders .

text: Kınık beylerinin kurduğu bu devlet hepimizin devletidir.
english: This state, founded by the lords of Kinik, is the state of all of us.

text: Ne Köpek gibi soysuzlar ne de devletimizin düşmanları buna mani olamayacaklardır.
english: Neither degenerate scoundrels like Dog nor the enemies of our state will be able to prevent this.

text: Şimdi yol yakınken dönün derim size.
english: I'd advise you to turn back while you still have the chance.

text: Dönün ki devletimiz daim olsun, düşmanlarımız bertaraf olsun.
english: Return so that our state may endure and our enemies may be defeated.
Ertuğrul Bey is right in what he says.
Know that I have relinquished my rightful claim to the throne. You no
longer have a sultan ruling over you.

text: Alt Yazı: Tugay Çiftçi - Fatih Kolivar - Çağrı Doğan
english: Subtitles: Tugay Çiftçi - Fatih Kolivar - Çağrı Doğan
